comment.author: 13267298@N00
comment._content: This is probably the National Golf Links of America at Southampton, N.Y. since the New York Times of September 14, 1913 has this report on a golf tournament there: query.nytimes.com/gst/abstract.html?res=9E07E6D9123FE633A...

comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: But it could also be Baltusrol. See the same NYT clipping that specifically mentions the crowds at Baltusrol to watch Low, Smith, Ray, and Vardon playing, See adjacent picture www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/4370154245/
